name: For Whom the Knell Tolls
description:
Submission for GMTK GJ 2021 !

For Whom The Link tolls is a game about rythm and positioning.

In this game, you'll have to decide whether you link to your foes to gather their abilities or keep distance.

The theme of the jam, joined together, is represented with a blue link joining all characters together, which implies common health and common abilities.

(the grenades are kinda fun)

This project is a prototype, bugs can and will occur.
